name: Quwave
tagline: This Table Top Harmonizer is designed for maximum Schumann Resonance stimulation into our body.
body: Majority of us understand the idea of Physical or Mental Harassment, but only a few understand Electronic Harassment. Although it is usually a type of [energy medicine](http://quwave.com/harmonizer-tabletop.html#buy) nevertheless the meaning and methods found in such type of harassment are very different as opposed to Physical or Mental Harassment.
